description.level_global_for_affiliate: Global: Postback will be triggered for all offers (all goals except CPC type).
description.level_offer_for_affiliate: Offer: Postback will be executed for the selected offer only. If the goal is not specified – it will be executed for all goals on that offer.
description.conversion_status_for_affiliate: Postback will be triggered for this conversion status only.
description.method_for_affiliate: Postback type supported by your system.

macros_available_postbacks.title: Macros Available
macros_available_postbacks.affiliate_id: ID of Affiliate promoting the offer.
macros_available_postbacks.sub_id1: Affiliate Sub ID 1 specified in the tracking link.
macros_available_postbacks.sub_id2: Affiliate Sub ID 2 specified in the tracking link.
macros_available_postbacks.sub_id3: Affiliate Sub ID 3 specified in the tracking link.
macros_available_postbacks.sub_id4: Affiliate Sub ID 4 specified in the tracking link.
macros_available_postbacks.sub_id5: Affiliate Sub ID 5 specified in the tracking link.
macros_available_postbacks.click_id: Unique 32 character alphanumeric string, which is generated and assigned to each click in platform
macros_available_postbacks.link_id: Offer additional link specified in the tracking link.
macros_available_postbacks.source_id: Affiliate Source ID specified in the tracking link.
macros_available_postbacks.aff_param1: Affiliate additional parameter 1 specified in the tracking link.
macros_available_postbacks.aff_param2: Affiliate additional parameter 2 specified in the tracking link.
macros_available_postbacks.aff_param3: Affiliate additional parameter 3 specified in the tracking link.
macros_available_postbacks.aff_param4: Affiliate additional parameter 4 specified in the tracking link.
macros_available_postbacks.aff_param5: Affiliate additional parameter 5 specified in the tracking link.
macros_available_postbacks.adv_param1: Advertiser additional parameter 1 specified upon the conversion.
macros_available_postbacks.adv_param2: Advertiser additional parameter 2 specified upon the conversion.
macros_available_postbacks.adv_param3: Advertiser additional parameter 3 specified upon the conversion.
macros_available_postbacks.adv_param4: Advertiser additional parameter 4 specified upon the conversion.
macros_available_postbacks.adv_param5: Advertiser additional parameter 5 specified upon the conversion.
macros_available_postbacks.aff_click_id: Affiliate Click ID. Unique ID for every click sent from Affiliate.
macros_available_postbacks.deep_link: Affiliate Source ID specified in the tracking link.
macros_available_postbacks.adv_order_id: Advertiser's order ID specified upon the conversion.
macros_available_postbacks.adv_user_id: Advertiser's user ID specified upon the conversion.
macros_available_postbacks.transaction_id: Transaction ID. Unique ID for every transaction in platform.
macros_available_postbacks.track_id: Additional information from Advertiser, specified upon the conversion.
macros_available_postbacks.ip: IP address that started the click session.
macros_available_postbacks.user_agent: User's agent string determined at the time of click.
macros_available_postbacks.device_type: User's device string determined at the time of click.
macros_available_postbacks.device_os: User's OS string determined at the time of click.
macros_available_postbacks.connection_type: User's connection type string determined at the time of click.
macros_available_postbacks.mobile_operator: User's mobile operator string determined at the time of click.
macros_available_postbacks.geo_country_code: User's country code determined at the time of click.
macros_available_postbacks.geo_country: User's country determined at the time of click.
macros_available_postbacks.geo_region: User's region determined at the time of click.
macros_available_postbacks.geo_city: User's city determined at the time of click.

referrals_page.commission_info: Refer new affiliates and receive a {{ commission }} commission from those affiliates’ earnings every month.
referrals_page.commission_info_for_flat: Refer new affiliates and receive a one-time commission of {{ commission }} for every referred affiliate.

api.title: API
api.hint_for_enable_api: Please contact your manager to enable an API for you.
